text: Best Friend is a 2007 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P Sunil Kumar Reddy, starring Mukesh and Jagathy Sreekumar and Sunaina in the lead roles. http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/3827/malayalam/best-friend/index.htm ==Cast== * Mukesh * Jagathy Sreekumar * Sunaina As Kavya * Niya Renjith ==References== ==External links== Category:2007 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
